BECOME A SUPPORTER

West City Boxing funds the West Auckland Youth Development Trust (WAYDT), our registered charity dedicated to developing young people and keeping them off the streets through the sport of boxing. Help us to continue reducing negative behaviours such as crime and violence in our community by engaging the youth in our programme that teaches them not only physical strength and conditioning but also mental focus and self-control while giving them a positive outlet as they grow into our leaders of tomorrow. We depend on our sponsors to thrive, and we welcome donations to both our boxing academy and our youth development fund. If you would like to become a supporter, complete the donation forms below or contact us for further information.

Register to become a member

If you would like to become a member of West Auckland Boxing Academy please click to REGISTER and complete the form. Once we have a place for you we will be in touch.

If you have a query or would like to discuss your requirements in more detail, please get in touch. Complete the form and I’ll get back to you as soon as possible.
